page.title: 11The Caravan Site.
page.content: I live in a detached house on Parklands Caravan Site. It is a residential site. On the site there is a little shop which sells peat, plantpots, watering cans, patio slabs and other garden things. There is also a little shop selling gas for the caravans. If you go out of my garden, there is a carpark. Behind the carpark there is a block of garages. There are many different kinds of caravans on the site. Some are as large as small bungalows. Behind another block of garages there is a lagoon. This is very attractive to people in hot weather. But, it is very dangerous and people have drowned there. The lagoon has been formed by water draining from Burringham Hill.
